casebody.data:
Leon R. KOZIOL, Individually, as Natural Parent of Child A and Child B, and on Behalf of Parents Similarly Situated, petitioner,
v.
Janet DiFIORE, Chief Judge, New York State Unified Court System, et al. No. 18-278. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 5, 2018.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Appellate Division, Supreme Court of New York, Fourth Judicial Department denied.
